resources.string: To start a new game, enter your name and choose a difficulty.
If you need help with choosing, please consider checking the Help page.

string-array.name: help_descriptions
string-array.item: The Startpage helps navigating the app. \n The explanation to the two buttons \'NEW GAME\' and \'HIGHSCORES\' can be found by swiping to the right. The darkmode is explained at the end of the help pages.

To start a new game you have to insert your username and the diffiiculty you want to play at.
 Easy: 20 bombs to detect
 Medium: 40 bombs
 Hard: 60 bombs

The principle of Minesweeper is to mark all bombs with a flag without revealing one. Once a bomb has been tapped, the game is over. 
 As an aid, the number of bombs in immediate vicinity is displayed when fields are uncovered. Through logical deduction you can find the fields with a bomb underneath it.
 Single-Click: Reveal field
 Long-Click: Flag the field as bomb
This section shows all the played games and with their difficulty and the duration. The fastest players will top the rankings, depending on the difficulty.

If the brightness of white is to damaging to your eyes, you can choose to use the darkmode which we kindly provided. To toggle it, simply go to the start-screen and flip the rescuing switch. Your selection will be stored, so that you dont get blinded if you want to play Minesweeper in the morning after waking up.
